name: Tales of Apler
description:
Apler awakens in a strange Village, maybe if he helps the locals he might find answers to why and how he got here. This game is a Top Down RPG style game, within the Demo there are 2 quests to complete, Grab Apples and Smash Spiders.

Controls:
  • WASD:- Movement
  • E:- Interact
  • Left Click:- Attack
Assets Used:
  • Character Sprites and Map tiles by ArMM1998 on OpenGameArt
  • Spider Sprites by William.Thompsonj on OpenGameArt
